citation: Schwartz, S. H. (2003). A proposal for measuring value orientations across nations. In Questionnaire Package of the European Social Survey (pp. 259-290). European Social Survey.
license: Used in European Social Survey; items publicly available via ESS documentation
note: PVQ-21 measures 10 basic values grouped into 4 higher-order categories matching atlas factors. Items are portrait descriptions rated for similarity to self.

items.text: Thinking up new ideas and being creative is important to this person. This person likes to do things in an original way
It is important to this person to be rich. This person wants to have a lot of money and expensive things
This person thinks it is important that every person in the world be treated equally. This person believes everyone should have equal opportunities in life
It is important to this person to show abilities. This person wants people to admire what this person does
It is important to this person to live in secure surroundings. This person avoids anything that might endanger personal safety
This person thinks it is important to do lots of different things in life. This person always looks for new things to try
This person believes that people should do what they are told. This person thinks people should follow rules at all times, even when no one is watching
It is important to this person to listen to people who are different. Even when this person disagrees, this person still wants to understand them
It is important to this person to be humble and modest. This person tries not to draw attention
Having a good time is important to this person. This person likes to spoil oneself
It is important to this person to make own decisions about what to do. This person likes to be free and not depend on others
It is very important to this person to help the people nearby. This person wants to care for their well-being
Being very successful is important to this person. This person hopes people will recognize the achievements
It is important to this person that the government ensures safety against all threats. This person wants the state to be strong so it can defend its citizens
This person looks for adventures and likes to take risks. This person wants to have an exciting life
It is important to this person to always behave properly. This person wants to avoid doing anything people would say is wrong
It is important to this person to be in charge and tell others what to do. This person wants people to do what is said
It is important to this person to be loyal to friends. This person wants to devote to people who are close
This person strongly believes that people should care for nature. Looking after the environment is important to this person
Tradition is important to this person. This person tries to follow the customs handed down by religion or family
This person seeks every chance to have fun. It is important to do things that bring pleasure
